videos.description: Wisconsin's Ethan Happ backs down a Michigan defender before scoring on a shot off glass while getting fouled.
videos.headline: Happ backs down defender for and-1 off glass

videos.description: D. Robinson made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by M. Abdur-Rahkma
videos.headline: Defense leads to offense for the Wolverines

videos.description: Wisconsin's Nigel Hayes gets the ball and dribbles the other way for a layup plus a foul against Michigan.
videos.headline: Hayes goes coast to coast for and-1 layup

videos.description: Wisconsin's Bronson Koenig makes a nice bounce pass to Vitto Brown, who makes a layup in the first half against Michigan.
videos.headline: Koenig's bounce pass sets up Brown for layup

videos.description: Michigan's head coach John Beilein talks about his team first half play
videos.headline: Michigan's head coach John Beilein talks about his team first half play

videos.description: Michigan's Moritz Wagner uses the dribble to back into the paint and score, giving the Wolverines a lead in the second half.
videos.headline: Michigan's Wagner dribbles his way to the hole
Michigan continues their strong 2nd half with Irvin jumper

videos.description: D. Trice made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by E. Happ.
videos.headline: Wisconsin gets the rebound off the miss free throw and then drains the 3-pointer

videos.description: Wisconsin's Ethan Happ catches the ball on the block, fakes and scores with his left hand while being fouled.
videos.headline: Happ gets the lefty layup and-1

videos.description: D. Robinson made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by M. Donnal.
videos.headline: Michigan's Robinson drains the 3-pointer to extend the lead

videos.description: Z. Showalter made Layup. Assisted by E. Happ.
videos.headline: Wisconsin's big man runs the floor and finds an open Showalter for the layin

videos.description: Wisconsin's Bronson Koenig talks about the  final stretch in a 68-64 victory over Michigan
videos.headline: Wisconsin's Bronson Koenig talks about the final stretch in a 68-64 victory over Michigan
